DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value:
SELECT '0' ROW_ID, NULL VENUE_DISRUPTION, NULL ACCEPT_ARTIC, NULL LIMIT_CATERING, NULL SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY, NULL SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K, NULL VEHICLE_REGISTRATION, NULL SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID ROW_ID, VENUE_DISRUPTION.SUB_AREA_CD VENUE_DISRUPTION, ACCEPT_ARTIC.SUB_AREA_CD ACCEPT_ARTIC, LIMIT_CATERING.SUB_AREA_CD LIMIT_CATERING, SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY.SUB_AREA_CD SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY, SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K.SUB_AREA_CD SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K, VEHICLE_REGISTRATION.SUB_AREA_CD VEHICLE_REGISTRATION, SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS.SUB_AREA_CD SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS FROM S_EVTLOC LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE VENUE_DISRUPTION ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = VENUE_DISRUPTION.SRC_ROW_ID AND VENUE_DISRUPTION.AREA_CD = '1.Any Disruption Issues' AND VENUE_DISRUPTION.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE VEHICLE_REGISTRATION ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = VEHICLE_REGISTRATION.SRC_ROW_ID AND VEHICLE_REGISTRATION.AREA_CD = '2.Venue requires vehicle Reg #' AND VEHICLE_REGISTRATION.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE ACCEPT_ARTIC ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = ACCEPT_ARTIC.SRC_ROW_ID AND ACCEPT_ARTIC.AREA_CD = '3.Can venue accept an artic' AND ACCEPT_ARTIC.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE LIMIT_CATERING ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = LIMIT_CATERING.SRC_ROW_ID AND LIMIT_CATERING.AREA_CD = '4.Does venue limit catering' AND LIMIT_CATERING.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY.SRC_ROW_ID AND SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY.AREA_CD = '5.Space for addit''nal activity' AND SPACE_FOR_ACTIVITY.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K.SRC_ROW_ID AND SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K.AREA_CD = '6.Suitable for Race/Run 10k' AND SUITABLE_FOR_RACE_AND_RUN10K.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN S_NOTE SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS ON S_EVTLOC.ROW_ID = SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS.SRC_ROW_ID AND SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS.AREA_CD = '7.Venue suitable for dogs' AND SUITABLE_FOR_DOGS.NOTE_TYPE = 'EVENT VENUE'
